title: AI and security: Safeguarding users and strengthening national security
description: AI holds immense possibilities for not just cybersecurity — but economic and national security.

America currently leads in the AI race, but to maintain that lead, bolster national security, and seize the opportunity ahead, industry and government will need to work together, build on existing efforts, and share insights.With this in mind, today we released new recommendations for policymakers, threat research on the adversarial misuse of AI, and insights on the role AI will play in national security from Google’s President of Global Affairs, Kent Walker, as well as initiatives designed to safeguard users and strengthen cyber defense in the AI era.

Jan 29, 2025 · 5 articles 29 Jan, 2025

articles 5

Jan 29, 2025 5 articles 29 Jan, 2025

articles 5

AI holds immense possibilities for not just cybersecurity — but economic and national security. America currently leads in the AI race, but to maintain that lead, bolster national security, and seize the opportunity ahead, industry and government will need to work together, build on existing efforts, and share insights.

With this in mind, today we released new recommendations for policymakers, threat research on the adversarial misuse of AI, and insights on the role AI will play in national security from Google’s President of Global Affairs, Kent Walker, as well as initiatives designed to safeguard users and strengthen cyber defense in the AI era.
